meanings.definition: The act or process of making something linear.
meanings.sent1: The linearization of the graph helped us understand the data better.
meanings.sent2: I used linearization to simplify the complex equation.
meanings.sent3: The linearization of the messy room made it look neat and organized.
meanings.sent4: Her linearization of the problem allowed us to see the solution clearly.
meanings.sent5: Through linearization, the jumbled information became easy to follow.

meanings.definition: The result of making something linear.
meanings.sent1: After the linearization, the once confusing data became clear.
meanings.sent2: The linearization of the design made it more aesthetically pleasing.
meanings.sent3: The linearization of the recipe turned it into a simple list of ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His linearization of the process simplified our workflow.
meanings.sent5: The linearization of the path made navigation straightforward.
